INTRO

Where are we? Does this place even exist?

This website was originally created at https://cargocollective.com/memberofthepublic, based on art I had created circa 2011 - 2015.
It remained dormant a long time, but I remained satisfied with the quality.
More recently (~2024) I experimented with a new medium - loops - and thought them good enough for this website.
But, there were issues with the old hosting provider (AVIF file formats rejected); and so, I rebuilt the website from scratch, and am now hosting it on big tech platforms, in hopes of greater longevity.

Hosted on Cloudflare Workers at https://memberofthepublic.meta-997.workers.dev/
Hosted on Google Firebase at https://memberofthepublic.web.app/ (does not automatically update)
